## Checklist

<!-- Check before submitting PR -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project coding style
- [ ] Self code review completed
- [ ] Comments added (especially for complex parts)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Changes don't generate new warnings

### Tests & Build
- [ ] New tests added (if needed)
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Type check passes (`pnpm type-check`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`pnpm lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`pnpm build`)

### Package Release (if applicable)
- [ ] Changeset created (`pnpm changeset`)
- [ ] Version type selected (major/minor/patch)
- [ ] Changeset description is clear

- [ ] Related tests added/modified
- [ ] Manual testing completed
